value.title: AMD's Processors to Power Microsoft Azure Virtual Machines
value.excerpt: AMD recently announced that its second generation EPYC processors and Radeon Instinct MI25 GPUs have been adopted by Microsoft’s MSFT Azure division to power its NVv4 virtual machines (VMs). AMD’s hardware will enable Azure to provide customers with a cloud based virtual desktop capable of handling memory and graphics intensive as well as high-performance computing workloads.
